casebody.data:
PFEFFER, Respondent, v. AHLERING, Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County,

General Term.

June 5, 1893.) Action by Julia Pfeifer, as administratrix of the estate of Philip Pfeifer, •deceased, against Minnie Ahlering, for the conversion of personal property and for money had and received.

Argued before BOOKSTAVER, BISCHOFF, and PRYOR, JJ.

Geo. W. McAdam, for appellant Chas. Goldzier, for respondent. PER CURIAM.

On the stipulation of counsel for the respective parties to •that effect, and herewith filed, the judgment of April 18, 1892, is reduced $3,300, damages and costs; and, as reduced, it is affirmed, without costs of this appeal to either party as against the other.
